summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent forwarding documents related to the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein, including the arrest report (302), advice of rights, property receipts, and items turned over to his lawyer on July 18, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the arrest documents being forwarded, including the arrest 302 report and related property receipts.

events.title: Items turned over to Epstein's lawyer
events.description: Items from Jeffrey Epstein's arrest were turned over to his lawyer.

events.title: Arrest documents forwarded
events.description: An FBI Special Agent forwarded arrest-related documents for Jeffrey Epstein via email.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested, as evidenced by an FBI arrest report (302) and related documents.
Items from Epstein's arrest were turned over to his lawyer on July 18, 2019.
The documents were forwarded by an FBI Special Agent from the New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit on July 29, 2019.
The attachments include the arrest 302, advice of rights, property receipt, and a receipt for items given to his lawyer.
